lyric:
[00:11.460]Deep magical trees murmuring breeze, carry me home
[00:15.940]Tell stories of hope, hope there's a light
[00:21.230]Tight energy thieves laying their wreaths outside unmarked doors
[00:26.550]A war is just a recourse to show that we're bored
[00:31.470]Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me
[00:36.880]Magical tree where nobody grieves the island, I see
[00:41.850]Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me
[00:47.030]Magical tree where nobody grieves, the island I see is in me
[00:59.120]Poor tourist you're lost you're just a cost to average man
[01:03.390]A plan leads to a plan and you're told that you can
[01:08.300]You can be just who you want be what you feel, be someone real
[01:14.320]Climb high to excess, and you'll be a success
[01:18.930]Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me
[01:24.520]Magical tree where nobody grieves the island, I see
[01:29.520]Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me
[01:34.640]Magical tree where nobody grieves, the island I see is in me
[02:01.100]Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me
[02:06.100]Magical tree where nobody grieves the island, I see
[02:11.460]Battles and wastelands, battles and wastelands in me
[02:16.890]Magical tree where nobody grieves, the island I see is in me
tlyric:
[by:董天佑l]
[00:11.460]微风吹过神秘的深树发出低语声，带我回家
[00:15.940]讲述着希望的故事，希望有一盏灯
[00:21.230]拮据的能量窃贼把他们的花圈扔在了无名碑外
[00:26.550]战争只是来证明我们无聊的一场追索
[00:31.470]战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
[00:36.880]神秘的树木，那里没有人为这岛屿悲伤，我知道
[00:41.850]战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
[00:47.030]神秘的树木，那里没有人悲伤，我看见的岛屿在我心中
[00:59.120]可怜的旅行者，你迷路了，你只是普通人的一个牺牲品
[01:03.390]一个计划导致了另一个计划，你被告知你可以
[01:08.300]你可以成为你想成为的人，你所感受的人，做真实的自己
[01:14.320]爬到最高点，你将成为一名成功者
[01:18.930]战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
[01:24.520]神秘的树木，那里没有人为这岛屿悲伤，我知道
[01:29.520]战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
[01:34.640]神秘的树木，那里没有人悲伤，我看见的岛屿在我心中
[02:01.100]战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
[02:06.100]神秘的树木，那里没有人为这岛屿悲伤，我知道
[02:11.460]战役与荒原，我心中的战役与荒原
[02:16.890]神秘的树木，那里没有人悲伤，我看见的岛屿在我心中
